feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Team Form - Email going to form owner and user doesn't have the option to disable it by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18222
  • fix: calendar cache date ranges by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18237
  • feat: v2 teams event types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18085
  • fix: v2 isSystemAdmin by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18162
  • feat: Plain integration by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18130
  • fix: single rejection caused cache cron to fail by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18239
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18234
  • feat: match edit user sheet designs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18243
  • fix: missing n8n app screenshot and add margin to the back button by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18240
  • refactor: v2 calendars busy-times by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18244
  • fix: platform decrease usage when cancelling booking by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18241
  • chore: app router - /getting-started page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18185
  • chore: app router - /reschedule pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18150
  • feat: Salesforce skip ownership check if attendee email is a free domain by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17916
  • chore: Set the stage for a primary key with value uuid() by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18245
  • feat: ooo calibration by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17864
  • fix: refactor and fix bulk attribute handling by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18231
  • fix: skip failed cache subscriptions from retrying by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18252

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.2...v4.8.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18249
  • chore: app router - /teams single page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18184
  • chore: bring back removed onboarding steps by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18254
  • chore: app router - /booking pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18182
  • chore: removed posthog identifier by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18253
  • chore: CRM logging, add booking uid by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18256
  • fix: Revert "app router - /reschedule pages #18150" by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18258

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.3...v4.8.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: seats option not working for booker atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18265
  • fix: event type atom availability by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18263
  • fix: include app directory in rewrites generation logic + migrate /reschedule pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18261

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.4...v4.8.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Booker atom default booking fields by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18275
  • fix: platform booker icons and styling by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18276
  • fix: platform booker timezone select by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18277
  • feat: Support event level conflict checking by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18052
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.5...v4.8.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.8.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: prevents cron to be clogged with malformed calendars by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18281
  • chore: add cal.com logo to platform booker embed by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18269
  • fix: password validation bug for pt-BR version by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18273
  • chore: move intercom /help into mintlify by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18301
  • feat: added chatbase app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18302
  • chore: add cache to static pages in app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18278
  • fix: refresh pages rendered by app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18304
  • fix: hotfix hide hidden booking fields in event-types GET / by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18306

New Contributors

  • @mintlify made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18301

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.8.6...v4.8.7
